Articles.Content:
This was the best location I could find for this.

I have not received as confirmation email from the board. I checked my address and it is correct

Also, when using the forum from s mobile device, there's no way to select a "prefix" as they don't appear at all. :-(

You may want to check your spam folder.

As for the prefix, I'm assuming you mean for the thread? If so, that is because it's not included in the "skin". The point of a mobile version of a site is to reduce the amount being loaded. I.e it lessens data usage on your mobile network. You can always click "Full Site" at the bottom of the page for the full site.

The concern remains valid, though; the New Thread form won't allow you to post a thread unless the thread prefix is set (though it can be set to "none"). It not being present in the mobile version of the forum means the form cannot be submitted... it's a rather foolish oversight by the designers of vBulletin. :/
